name: Real Basketball Shooter
description:
Real Basketball Shooter is a great game for basketball lovers.. If you are good in throwing balls and good enough to find baskets.you are going to love this game Very addictive game. Real Basketball Shooter is constituent of perfectly tuned physics of great basketball
Real Basketball Shooter is a complete game it will surely make you addictive because of its huge amount of challenges.
Feel the real experience of basketball as you are in basketball court.

Game Features:
Great Graphics great controls great levels and highly addictive game.
Real Basketball Shooter consist of many levels with different backgrounds and multiple Colorful balls..
Best graphics great music.

Unlock the multiple color balls:
Unlock the level you must need to rescue ten attempts of basketball.
Score to unleash one basketball life.
Score special basket without hitting the pole board to rescue 2 lives.
You need to unlock the different color of basket ball after completing the levels.
Dare to compete the challenges and unlock the next new colorful ball.

How To Play:
Swipe on screen. And maintain the best projectile motion to score the baskets.
Score without hitting the basket pole board to get maximum points.
Score to gain maximum lives of basketball.

Level Complete:
Level will sow maximum number of endless basketball courts.
Maximum level will unleash colorful balls.

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
